articles.description: Tributes to Sir Bobby Charlton, build-up to the next Euro 2024 qualifying matches, transfer rumours, latest football news, plus more.
articles.title: Football latest - Sir Bobby Charlton tributes

articles.description: There was more on the line than a spot at the 1990 World Cup - the United States team feared for their jobs, homes and the very future of football in their country.
articles.title: Bags of urine, cans of Bud and the team that saved US soccer

articles.description: Luton winger Andros Townsend says he is making "little 1%" efforts in an attempt to prolong his career - including eating chicken feet for dinner.
articles.title: Townsend eats chicken feet in bid to extend career

articles.description: Why David Warner, a man of many personas, can be regarded as a one-day great if he leads Australia to glory in India.
articles.title: 'Australia's man of many personas can bow out an ODI great'

articles.description: Former Manchester United manager Sir Alex Ferguson and others pay tribute at club legend Sir Bobby Charlton's funeral.
articles.title: 'A wonderful, humble man' - Ferguson on Charlton

articles.description: Match of the Day 2-s Alan Shearer, Ian Wright and Mark Chapman analyse how ex-Manchester City player Cole Palmer has made an impact at Chelsea.
articles.title: MOTD analysis: How 'magnificent' Palmer created vital Chelsea impact

articles.description: Scotland are motivated by the feeling they did not do themselves justice at the last European Championship, says defender Liam Cooper.
articles.title: Scotland must ride wave of expectation - Cooper

articles.description: Emma Raducanu pulls out of an exhibition match in December as she continues her rehabilitation from hand and foot operations.
articles.title: Raducanu pulls out of December exhibition match

articles.description: Liverpool's Trent Alexander-Arnold says he is continuing to learn his "hybrid" role by watching video clips of some of the game's best midfielders.
articles.title: Alexander-Arnold embracing 'hybrid' midfield role

articles.description: Former England internationals Jill Scott, Ellen White and Anita Asante are named as the 2023 inductees into the Women's Super League Hall of Fame.
articles.title: Scott, White and Asante enter WSL Hall of Fame
